text: Guttula galatheae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Seguenziidae. ==Description== The height of the shell varies between 3.5 mm and 4 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off New Zealand, in the Kermadec Trench at depths between 6,660 m and 6,770 m. ==References== * Knudsen J. 1964. Scaphopoda and Gastropoda from depths exceeding 6000 meters. Galathea Report 7: 125–136, page(s): 127–129 galatheae Category:Gastropods described in 1964
title: Guttula galatheae
